Description of incident: "On July 19, 2016 two laptop computers belonging to the medical offices of Dr. Brian Halevie-Goldman were stolen. The laptops were password protected, secured in a carrying case and locked inside a vehicle when the theft occurred.  It is not known whether the information contained on the laptops was or will be accessed by the thief.  It is possible that the laptops themsleves and not the information they contained were the target of the thief."The information compromised included names, birthdate and patient charts.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-63286
